name: S.E.C.U.
description:
S.E.C.U. is an arcade zombie first person shooter.

Features (As of version 0.1.0) :
- 4 Horde Mode Maps
- 3 Bosses
- 12 Weapons
- Over 20 Weapon Starter Cards To Unlock
- Firing Range

Fight your way through 20 waves of zombies and fight a boss at the end,


Unlock and choose your loadout!



Buy better weapons from walls!



Upgrade yourself with perks!



Buy better decked out weapons in mystery crate!
